headline: Got $1,000? 3 Dividend Stocks to Buy Now While They're on Sale
summary: High-yielding Vici Properties (NYSE: VICI) is down nearly 15% from its 52-week high, as are Dividend Kings Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) and Hormel Foods (NYSE: HRL).  Here's why this trio of dividend stocks is worth a closer look today.  Real estate investment trust (REIT) Vici Properties is arguably focused on experiential properties.
